page.title: 03BRASS BAND
page.content: I PLAY IN THE{CARLTON MINIOTT SCHOOL} BRASS BAND.THERE ARE 5 CORNETS,3 TENOR HORNS AND 2 BARITONES.I PLAY A TENOR HORN.I STARTED PLAYING 9 MONTHS AGO.IT IS NOW JULY 1985.DURING THAT TIME I HAVE PLAYED IN FRONT OF THE SCHOOL 3 TIMES AND I HAVE JUST PLAYED IN A GARDEN FETE.THE BAND PRATICE 3 TIMES A WEEK.ONCE ON A MONDAY,ONCE ON A WEDNESDAY AND ONCE ON A THURSDAY AFTER SCHOOL.WHEN WE FIRST STARTED TO PLAY A LOT OF PEOPLE COULDN'T READ MUSIC.NOW EVERYONE CAN READ MUSIC.THERE IS MORE TO PLAYING THAN YOU THINK BECAUSE YOU HAVE TO CLEAN YOUR INSTRUMENT AND KEEP THE VALVES FROM STICKING.YOU DO THIS BY PUTTING SOME OIL ON THEM. WE ALL ENJOY PLAYING THE INSTRUMENTS AND A LOT MORE PEOPLE WANT TO PLAY.
